sen.j: 九鬼 隆晁（くき たかあき、宝暦12年（1762年） - 安永8年8月12日 (旧暦)（1779年9月21日））は、丹波国綾部藩の世嗣。
sen.e: Takaaki KUKI (1762 - September 21, 1779) was an heir to Ayabe domain in Tango Province.
Takaaki KUKI (1762 - September 21, 1779) was an heir to Ayabe Domain in Tango Province.
Takaaki KUKI (1762 - September 21, 1779) was an heir to Ayabe Domain in Tango Province.

sen.j: 上総国飯野藩主・保科正富の三男。
sen.e: He was the third son of Masatomi HOSHINA, the lord of Iino domain in Kazusa Province.
He was the third son of Masatomi HOSHINA, the lord of Iino Domain in Kazusa Province.
He was the third son of Masatomi HOSHINA, the lord of Iino Domain in Kazusa Province.

sen.j: 安永7年（1778年）、綾部藩5代藩主・九鬼隆貞の養子となり徳川家治に拝謁する。
sen.e: In 1778, Takaaki was adopted by Takasada KUKI, the fifth lord of Ayabe domain, and had an audience with Ieharu TOKUGAWA.
In 1778, Takaaki was adopted by Takasada KUKI, the fifth lord of Ayabe Domain, and had an audience with Ieharu TOKUGAWA.
In 1778, Takaaki was adopted by Takasada KUKI, the fifth lord of Ayabe Domain, and had an audience with Ieharu TOKUGAWA.

sen.j: しかし、翌安永8年（1779年）に18歳で早世した。
sen.e: Unfortunately, in 1779, he died early at the age of 18.
Unfortunately, in 1779, he died early at the age of 18.
Unfortunately, in 1779, he died early at the age of 18.

sen.j: 代わって、老中・田沼意次の七男である九鬼隆棋が養子に迎えられ、嫡子となった。
sen.e: Takayoshi, the seventh son of Okitsugu TANUMA, senior councilor to the shogun, was adopted subsequently and became the heir as Takayoshi KUKI.
Takayoshi, the seventh son of Okitsugu TANUMA, senior councilor to the shogun, was adopted subsequently and became the heir as Takayoshi KUKI.
Takayoshi, the seventh son of Okitsugu TANUMA, senior councilor to the shogun, was adopted subsequently and became the heir as Takayoshi KUKI.
